Package doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaAnimation

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.graphics.DoaAnimation
public final class DoaAnimation extends Object
Objects of this class are responsible for providing support for sprite based animations. In order to facilitate this class' objects, one must use the factory methods inside DoaAnimations class.
  • DoaAnimations.createAnimation(String, String, long)
  • DoaAnimations.createAnimation(String, List, long)
Since:
DoaEngine 2.2
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:
DoaAnimations

    int
    getIndex()
    Returns the current index of the sprite to render.
    BufferedImage
    next()
    Advances the sprite pointer to the next index, retrieves the sprite at that index; loops back to beginning if there are no more sprites on the buffer, and returns the sprite.
    void
    reset()
    Resets the next sprite to render to the first frame in the animation.

    • next

      public BufferedImage next()
      Advances the sprite pointer to the next index, retrieves the sprite at that index; loops back to beginning if there are no more sprites on the buffer, and returns the sprite.
      Returns:
      the next sprite to render

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the next sprite to render to the first frame in the animation.
